dialogue: Oh! Hello!
You're new around here aren't you?
What brings you to our humble little town?
Oh! So you're the brave adventurer that I've been hearing about!
A quiet one I see! No matter! From what I gather from your attire you must be the brave adventurer who've accepted the town's commission!
Well! I guess today's your lucky day!
As a small thanks for helping our town out with the commission I would like to give you these hand-crafted by yours truly!
It looks like you've only got space for one so choose carefully!
Hm! Now you look stronger than before!
I'll take that as a compliment!
Why thank you for your high praise!
Ah! Before you go let me tell you a shortcut to where you're going!
You can either go by that path further down the road or simply slide down a steep slope that you encounter on that path on the left.
Which way would you go?
Goodluck! We await your good news!
I see! Safe travels! We await your good news!
Oh! You're finally awake!
You had us worried for a moment there!
You were taking quite a while so we decided to send some people to check things out.
Imagine our surprise to see you passed out in there!
You didn't manage to fully complete the commisssion but you've worked hard!
In total you spent {0} doing the commission and successfully eliminated a total of {1} enemies!
Thanks for your hard work!
Before you leave why don't you rest up first?
Have a good rest!
Oh alright. Hope to see you again!
Welcome back!
Wow! You really completed our commission effortlessly!
I knew that you're the guy to do it the moment I set my eyes on you!
In total you spent {0} doing the commission and successfully eliminated a total of {1} enemies!
Thanks for your hard work!
Before you leave why don't you rest up first?
Have a good rest!
Oh alright. Hope to see you again!
